text.0: turn go not farther on your way visit us o ye wealthy ones.
text.1: agni and soma ye who bring riches again secure us wealth.
text.2: make these return to us again bring them beside us once again.
text.3: may indra give them back to us and agni drive them hitherward.
text.4: let them return to us again under this herdsman let them feed.
text.5: do thou o agni keep them here and let the wealth we have remain.
text.6: call upon their herdsman him who knoweth well their coming nigh.
text.7: their parting and their homereturn and watcheth their approach and rest.
text.8: yea let the herdsman too return who marketh well their drivingforth.
text.9: marketh their wandering away their turning back and coming home.
text.10: homeleader lead them home to us indra restore to us our kine.
text.11: we will rejoice in them alive.
text.12: offer you on every side butter and milk and strengthening food.
text.13: may all the holy deities pour down on us a flood of wealth.
text.14: o thou homeleader lead them home restore them thou who bringest home.
text.15: four are the quarters of the earth from these bring back to us our kine.
